name: Sengoku Neet
description:
[Genre]Strategy Conquest Simulation


----------It’s a turbulent time: the Sengoku period.
Many lords battle against each other, aiming to be Conqueror of the World.

Once, there lived a feudal lord who did nothing but eat and sleep.
Then, his servant inspired him to arise and become a ruler!
Chaotic battles are about to begin![System]
  • You have seven types of soldiers and four separate attributes. Closely examine the enemy's defenses and conquer them all!
  • There are more than 120 characters in the game!
  • Find your general's favorite foods to train them up and make them stronger!
  • Use gathered and plundered materials to develop the conquered lands into powerful strategic strongholds!
[Basic Operation]This game requires mouse to play.
